text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتَكُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَىٰكُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱللَّهِ بَغۡتَةً أَوۡ جَهۡرَةً هَلۡ يُهۡلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Babwire kandi uti: “Nimumbwire mu gihe mwoshikirwa giturumbuka n’ibihano vy’Imana Allah; canke bikabashikira imbona nkubone, hari abohona atari abantu birenganya mu guhakana Intumwa no mu kubangikanya Imana Allah!”.
